com.github.nitnelave.xmlparser

Class XMLParser

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.github.nitnelave.xmlparser.XMLParser

  • public class XMLParser
extends Object
    Generic XML SAX parser.

    This class handles the registration of XMLNodes and listeners, and takes care of the actual parsing.

    Author:
    nitnelave
    See Also:
    XMLProperty, XMLNode

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      XMLParser() 

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void parse(InputStream in)
      Start parsing, taking the input from the stream given.
      void registerListener(Object handler)
      Register a listener.
      void registerNodes(Class<?>... nodes)
      Register classes that describe XML Nodes.
      If the classes do not have the @XMLNode annotation, or there is a required method missing, an XMLStructureException will be raised.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        equals, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Constructor Detail

      • XMLParser

        public XMLParser()

    • Method Detail

      • registerNodes

        public void registerNodes(Class<?>... nodes)
                   throws XMLStructureException
        Register classes that describe XML Nodes.
        If the classes do not have the @XMLNode annotation, or there is a required method missing, an XMLStructureException will be raised.
        Parameters:
        nodes - The list of classes to be registered as xml nodes
        Throws:
        XMLStructureException - if there is an architecture problem.
        See Also:
        XMLStructureException

      • registerListener

        public void registerListener(Object handler)
                      throws XMLStructureException
        Register a listener. The class will be inspected for compatible methods.
        Make sure to register all the node before registering handlers;
        Parameters:
        handler - the handler class, with the appropriate methods
        Throws:
        XMLStructureException - if there is no root node defined

      • parse

        public void parse(InputStream in)
           throws SAXException,
                  IOException,
                  ParserConfigurationException
        Start parsing, taking the input from the stream given.
        Parameters:
        in - The stream to read from
        Throws:
        SAXException - parsing error, either from SAX (see SAX documentation) or from a problem in the parsed file structure.
        ParserConfigurationException - see SAXParser documentation
        IOException - if there is a IO error
